title: Avatar
cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
description: Set more than a decade after the events of the first film, Avatar: The Way of Water begins to tell the story of the Sully family.

title: Avengers: Endgame
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order.

title: Titanic
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
cast: Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver
description: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Josh Brolin
description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
cast: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: Jurassic World
cast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Vincent D'Onofrio
description: A new theme park is built on the original site of Jurassic Park. Everything is going well until the park's newest attraction—a genetically modified giant stealth killing machine—escapes containment.

title: The Lion King
cast: Donald Glover, Beyoncé, James Earl Jones, Chiwetel Ejiofor
description: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince must flee his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Avengers
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Furious 7
cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Michelle Rodriguez
description: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

title: Frozen II
cast: Idina Menzel, Kristen Bell, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad
description: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry.

title: Black Panther
cast: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
cast: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Ralph Fiennes
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.

title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
cast: Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley
description: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers.

title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
cast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Rafe Spall, Justice Smith
description: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs.

title: Frozen
cast: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter.

title: Beauty and the Beast
cast: Emma Watson, Dan Stevens, Luke Evans, Kevin Kline
description: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love.

title: Incredibles 2
cast: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell, Huck Milner
description: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr must manage the house while his wife Helen goes out to save the world.

title: Dangal
cast: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become world-class wrestlers.

title: PK
cast: Aamir Khan, Anushka Sharma, Sanjay Dutt, Sushant Singh Rajput
description: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship.

title: 3 Idiots
cast: Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Sharman Joshi, Kareena Kapoor
description: In the tradition of 'Educating Rita' and 'Dead Poets Society', this coming-of-age film follows three friends who go to engineering college.

title: Sultan
cast: Salman Khan, Anushka Sharma, Randeep Hooda, Amit Sadh
description: Sultan is a story of a wrestler whose journey takes him from being a celebrated champion to a forgotten name.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
cast: Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Harshaali Malhotra
description: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

title: Tiger Zinda Hai
cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Angad Bedi, Sajjad Delafrooz
description: A RAW agent and an ISI agent must work together to save a group of nurses held hostage in Iraq.

title: Padmaavat
cast: Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh, Shahid Kapoor, Aditi Rao Hydari
description: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty.

title: War
cast: Hrithik Roshan, Tiger Shroff, Vaani Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana
description: An Indian soldier is assigned to eliminate his former mentor who has gone rogue.

title: Sanju
cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Paresh Rawal, Vicky Kaushal, Manisha Koirala
description: A biopic of Sanjay Dutt, tracing his journey from his early days in Bollywood to his arrest and eventual release.

title: Tiger 3
cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Emraan Hashmi
description: Tiger and Zoya are back. This time, it's personal.

title: RRR
cast: Ram Charan, Jr NTR, Alia Bhatt, Ajay Devgn
description: Two revolutionaries fight against British colonial rule in 1920s India.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamannaah
description: When Shiva learns that he is the son of Bahubali, he begins to look for answers.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Tamannaah
description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

title: KGF: Chapter 2
cast: Yash, Sanjay Dutt, Raveena Tandon, Srinidhi Shetty
description: Rocky takes control of the Kolar Gold Fields and his newfound power makes the government as well as his enemies jittery.

title: KGF: Chapter 1
cast: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Ramachandra Raju, Archana Jois
description: The story of Rocky, a young man who rises from poverty to become a feared gangster in the gold mines of Kolar.

title: Saaho
cast: Prabhas, Shraddha Kapoor, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Jackie Shroff
description: An undercover agent must stop a criminal mastermind from stealing a black box containing 2000 crores.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
cast: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil, Sunil
description: A labourer named Pushpa makes enemies as he rises in the world of red sandalwood smuggling.

title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
cast: Allu Arjun, Pooja Hegde, Tabu, Jayaram
description: A man learns he was switched at birth and sets out to claim his rightful place in his biological family.

title: Sarkaru Vaari Paata
cast: Mahesh Babu, Keerthy Suresh, Samuthirakani, Vennela Kishore
description: A loan agent who is cheated by a woman travels to India to settle scores with her father.

title: Master
cast: Vijay, Vijay Sethupathi, Malavika Mohanan, Arjun Das
description: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a ruthless gangster.

title: Vikram
cast: Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Fahadh Faasil, Narain
description: A special agent investigates a murder committed by a masked group of serial killers.

title: Ponniyin Selvan: I
cast: Vikram, Aishwarya Rai, Karthi, Trisha
description: A story about the early days of Arulmozhivarman, who would become the great Chola emperor Rajaraja Chola I.

title: Beast
cast: Vijay, Pooja Hegde, Selvaraghavan, Yogi Babu
description: A RAW agent must save hundreds of hostages from a shopping mall taken over by terrorists.

title: Valimai
cast: Ajith Kumar, Huma Qureshi, Karthikeya, Bani J
description: A police officer is assigned to track down a gang of motorcyclists causing chaos in the city.

title: Radhe Shyam
cast: Prabhas, Pooja Hegde, Bhagyashree, Krishnamraju
description: A palmist who predicts the future falls in love with a doctor, but his predictions come between them.

title: Acharya
cast: Chiranjeevi, Ram Charan, Pooja Hegde, Kajal Aggarwal
description: A revolutionary rises against a corporate tycoon who is exploiting the poor and destroying nature.

title: Bheemla Nayak
cast: Pawan Kalyan, Rana Daggubati, Nithya Menen, Samuthirakani
description: A police officer and a local politician clash when their paths cross over a petty issue.

title: Sita Ramam
cast: Dulquer Salmaan, Mrunal Thakur, Rashmika Mandanna, Sumanth
description: An orphaned soldier's life changes after he receives a letter from a girl named Sita Mahalakshmi.

title: Liger
cast: Vijay Deverakonda, Ananya Panday, Ramya Krishna, Ronit Roy
description: A mixed martial arts fighter from Mumbai dreams of becoming a world champion.

title: Pushpa: The Rule
cast: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil, Sunil
description: The continuation of Pushpa's story as he rises to become the undisputed king of the red sandalwood smuggling syndicate.
